description: Retrieves all active sessions for a specific user. Includes session metadata like IP addresses, devices, and creation timestamps. Requires admin role.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose sessions to retrieve

200.description: Success - Returns list of user sessions

userAgent.description: User agent string of the session

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have admin role

x-specs.given: An authenticated admin user and a user with multiple sessions
x-specs.when: Admin requests list of user sessions
x-specs.then: Returns 200 OK with all active user sessions

executeQuery: INSERT INTO users (id, email, password_hash, name, email_verified, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (1, 'admin@example.com', '$2a$10$YourHashedPasswordHere', 'Admin User', true, 'admin', NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO users (id, email, password_hash, name, email_verified, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (2, 'target@example.com', '$2a$10$YourHashedPasswordHere', 'Target User', true, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, ip_address, user_agent, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'admin_token', '192.168.1.1', 'Mozilla/5.0 (Admin)', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, ip_address, user_agent, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (2, 2, 'user_session_1', '192.168.1.10', 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows)', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())

INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, ip_address, user_agent, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (3, 2, 'user_session_2', '192.168.1.20', 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone)', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day')

assertions.description: Response contains sessions array with metadata
